title: Nike Delays Launch of Travis Scott Sneaker After Astroworld Festival Deaths
sub_head: Houston Police Department is investigating the rapper’s concert, where a crowd surge this month killed 10 and injured dozens
body:
Nike Inc. said it is postponing the launch of its sneaker collaboration with Travis Scott after 10 people died and dozens were injured at the rapper’s Astroworld Festival in Houston earlier this month.
“Out of respect for everyone impacted by the tragic events at the Astroworld Festival, we are postponing the launch of the Air Max 1 x Cactus Jack,” Nike said in a statement on its website.
